text.div:
This case-sensitive code system https://nrces.in/ndhm/fhir/r4/CodeSystem/ndhm-program-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
ESIC ESIC
PIP Add private insurance program(PIP)
CAPF CAPF
HMDG RAN/HMDG
STATE STATE SCHEMES
MAA MAA (Mothers’ Absolute Affection) Programme for Infant and Young Child Feeding
NIPIAC National Iron Plus Initiative for Anaemia Control
NVAPP National Vitamin A prophylaxis Programe
ICDS Integrated Child Development Services
MDMP Mid-Day Meal Programme
NTEP National Tuberculosis Elimination Programme
PPP Pulse Polio Programme
NPCTOD National Programme for Control Treatment of Occupational Diseases
PMNDP Pradhan Mantri National Dialysis Programme
LaQshya LaQshya’ programme (Labour Room Quality Improvement Initiative)
NHM National Health Mission
PM-ABHIM PM Ayushman Bharat Health Infrastructure Mission
PHI Private Health Insurance
AB-PMJAY Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY)
CGHS Central Government Health Scheme (CGHS)
ECHS Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme(ECHS)
JSSK Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakaram
RKSK Rashtriya Kishor Swasthya Karyakram
RBSK Rashtriya Bal SwasthyaKaryakram
JSY Janani Suraksha Yojana
PMSMA Pradhan Mantri Surakshit Matritva Abhiyan
NSSK NavjaatShishu Suraksha Karyakram
NPPCF National Programme for Prevention and Control of Fluorosis
IDSP Integrated Disease Surveillance Programme
NLEP National Leprosy Eradication Programme
NCVBDCP National Centre for Vector Borne Diseases Control Progarmme
PPCL Programme for Prevention and Control of leptospirosis
NACP National AIDS Control Programme
NVHCP National Viral Hepatitis Control Program
NRCP National Rabies Control Programme
AMR National Programme on Containment of Anti-Microbial Resistance
NTCP National Tobacco Control Programme
NPCDCS National Programme for Prevention and Control of Cancer, Diabetes, Cardiovascular Diseases & Stroke
NPPCD National Programme for Prevention and Control of Deafness
NMHP National Mental Health Programme
NPCBVI National Programme for Control of Blindness& Visual Impairment
NPHCE National Programme for the Health Care for the Elderly
NPPMBI National Programme for Prevention & Management of Burn Injuries
NOHP National Oral Health programme
NPCCHH National Programme on Climate Change & Human Health
ABY Ayushman Bharat Yojana
PMSSY Pradhan Mantri Swasthya Suraksha Yojana
ABDM Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission
NPPC National Programme for Palliative Care
OTH Other

name: ProgramCode
title: Program Code
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards
description: This CodeSystem contains set of codes that can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties
